text: Hanki provinsirema kvama huterema hu'naza Jerusalemi rankumapi emani'naze. Hagi Pristi naga'ene Livae naga'ene, mono nompima eri'zama erisaza vahe'ene Solomoni eri'za vahe'mokizmi naga nofipinti vahe'ma Juda mopafima me'nea ne'onse kumatamimpima nemaniza vahe'mo'zanena kumazamifi mani'ne'za mopazamine rankumazmia zamagra'a kegava hutere hu'naze.
